1.title: Pilot
1.plot: In the royal residence of Lal Mahal, two infants are born. The girl baby is secretly handed over to a Pandit. The Pandit takes care of his adopted daughter, Anami.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Vatsalya Vikram Singh goes to Benaras with his family to celebrate his birthday and comes across Anami. Pujan Singh plots to kill the birthday boy.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Vatsalya finds Anami on the banks of river Ganga and talks to her. Pujan Singh's henchmen attack Vatsalya and try to drown him dead.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: As Vatsalya's mother refuses to send him to Delhi, Pujan Singh instigates Vatsalya to leave the house.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Vatsalya gets caught by his bodyguard and agrees to return home. His car meets with a horrific accident.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: While Baldev recalls his joyful days with Vatsalya, Satrupa refuses to accept Vatsalya's death. She decides to kill herself.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Pujan Singh draws the media's attention to portray his innocence. As Anami exposes a phony Baba, his henchmen seek revenge and attack her.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Anami bashes up the thugs who attack her. Guruji tells a disturbed Satrupa about her daughter's whereabouts and advises her to bring her to Lal Mahal.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Vikramaditya snubs Narotam when he tries to persuade him to declare him as the heir. Unaware of Anami's identity, Satrupa looks for Murari's house.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Satrupa visits Murari Pathak and meets her daughter, Anami. Satrupa requests Anami to return home.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Adiraj orders his aide to find Satrupa's whereabouts. Damo motivates Satrupa to fight for her children.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Satrupa forcibly brings Anami home, while Pujan Singh performs the rituals to declare Avdhoot, the successor of the house.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Pujan Singh is all set to declare Avdhoot the successor of the royal family.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Satrupa tells everyone about Vatsalya's twin sister, Anami. Later, Anami does the unthinkable, leaving everyone shocked.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Baldev refuses to accept Anami as his daughter. Adhiraj follows Narottam.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Adhiraj finds a way to enter Lal Mahal and comes across Anami. Pujan Singh provokes Vikramaditya Singh to kill Anami in her sleep.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Vikramaditya feels Guruji betrayed them. Later, Anami creates a scene at the breakfast table.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Anami is relieved after speaking to her foster parents over the phone. Pujan Singh becomes restless as Adhiraj arrives at Lal Mahal for investigation.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Adhiraj questions everyone about Vatsalya's case. He asks Satrupa the reason behind keeping Vatsalya and not Anami.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Adamant Anami continues her hunger strike despite Satrupa and Damo's attempts. At midnight, Anami sneaks inside the kitchen and hears a whimper.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: After talking to Anami, Gayatri is reminded of Vatsalya. Vikramaditya Singh asks Satrupa to leave the house with Anami.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Gayatri tries to trick Anami and feed her food. Pujan Singh and Satrupa have a heated argument. Adhiraj interrogates Murari Pathak.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: Anami faints and Satrupa makes a plan to make her have food.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Satrupa meets Adhiraj and seeks his help. Adhiraj meets Anami at midnight and questions her.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: Anami teaches Pujan Singh a lesson for humiliating her parents. Meanwhile, Kamini is under the scanner over Adhiraj's revelation.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Kamini pretends to be sick and avoids Adhiraj's questions. Narottam makes a shocking revelation to Satrupa.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Pujan is successful in convincing Satrupa that he is innocent. Satrupa then threatens to kill Narottam for his false statements.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Satrupa allows Anami to enter Vatsalya's room. Later, Poonam rushes to inform Satrupa about Anami being sick.

29.title: Episode #1.29
29.plot: At the company meeting, Vikramaditya Singh suffers from a heart attack. Narottam reveals the news about Vikramaditya's illness to a mysterious lady.

30.title: Episode #1.30
30.plot: Narottam reveals to Anami that he was beaten up. She assures to protect him. Meanwhile,a mystery man wants Vikramaditya to survive at any cost.

31.title: Episode #1.31
31.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

32.title: Episode #1.32
32.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

33.title: Episode #1.33
33.plot: Anami distracts the doctor and replaces her blood sample. Avdhoot rescues Adhiraj's sister from a gang of goons.

34.title: The Verdict
34.plot: Anami thanks Poonam for hiding the truth from Satrupa about the DNA test. Later, the court's judgment leaves Anami shattered.

35.title: Episode #1.35
35.plot: While the DNA test results prove Anami to be Baldev's rightful daughter, Anami comes up with an escape plan.

36.title: Anami sees Vatsalya
36.plot: Anami steals the keys from Satrupa. She rushes to Vatsalya's room and feels nostalgic about him.

37.title: Episode #1.37
37.plot: Anami decides to return to Lal Mahal to avenge Vatsalya's murderers. She also has plans to make Satrupa's life hell.

38.title: Episode #1.38
38.plot: Gayatri plans a special ritual to welcome her granddaughter, Anami. Anami refuses to follow it.

imdb.title: Rishton ka chakravyuh
plot: Set amidst the royal backdrop, the show focuses on a rich industrial family residing at the majestic Lal Mahal, which is home to many conspiracies. It depicts the story of Satrupa, an authoritative woman and her daughter Anami.
